item.title: Trump authorises 'full force if necessary' while sending troops to Portland
item.description: <p>President Donald Trump said Saturday he will send troops to Portland, Oregon, a city he described as &quot;war ravaged,&quot; to protect Immigration and Customs Enforcement facilities he claimed are &quot;under siege&quot; by Antifa and &quot;other domestic terrorists.&quot;</p>

item.title: Clive Palmer escalates case against Australian government to Switzerland's highest court
